Key Match Events: Kusal Mendis scored 60 runs for Sri Lanka
Sri Lanka won by 2 wickets (with 4 balls remaining)
Post-Match Reflections: Kusal Mendis was named Player of the Match
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the T20I debut for Ebadot Hossain and Asitha Fernando
Others: The match was played at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium
